casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Michael REED 365A16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 6, 2018 E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Paul E. Smith, Attorney at Law, for Reed, David Michael.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of July 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of July 2018."
